snippet: After three hearings in Tehran, the fourth was likely to be the last for the Washington Post correspondent, although no date has been set.
abstract: Washington Post executive editor Martin Baron reports espionage trial of correspondent Jason Rezaian in Iran may be over soon, citing information from Rezaian's lawyer; arrested July 2015 and facing 20 years in prison, Rezaian has had three closed hearings over past two months and Iranian officials told his lawyer undated fourth hearing would most likely be last one.
lead_paragraph: After three hearings in Tehran, the fourth was likely to be the last for the Washington Post correspondent, although no date has been set.

headline.main: Iran: Reporter’s Espionage Trial May Be Nearing End, Editor Says
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iran: Reporter’s Espionage Trial May Be Nearing End, Editor Says
